data.name: TRIP
data.detailed_description:
Welcome Aboard!

Take your place for this journey aboard a very special train, which will make you discover incredible creatures in this ambient game!
It will be a captivating adventure, sometimes frightening, but above all, wonderful.

Gameplay Features

This is a walking simulator at 1st person, and you need a keyboard and a mouse to play.
You'll have to explore the train and other places like train stations.
You will find and use some objects and tools to progress in the game.
However, TRIP is mostly focused on discovering strange places and creatures, unique atmospheres and feelings.
The average playtime is 1 hour.

The game is in development, so add it to your wishlist to be aware of the latest news !



Thanks to the Haunted PS1 community for showing the trailer for the EEK3 2021 !!

data.short_description: Embark for an oniric and surrealist trip in this retro ambient game. A train will take you through the frontier between dreams and reality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Sometimes can be really frightening, and sometimes can be a bit violent
